title: Integrated Curriculum Design Workshop for Developing Scientific Giftedness Potential

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen competencies in designing integrated experimental activities tailored to the characteristics of science-gifted students.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the learning characteristics (cognitive level, problem-solving preferences) and interest patterns (topic preferences, activity types) of 3 science-gifted students, and submit 1 customized math activity design plan (including activity objectives, step-by-step procedures, and evaluation methods) reflecting the analysis.
Developing three or more science laboratory activities based on an integrated curriculum framework
Implementation of at least two strategies for developing giftedness through integrated math-science problem-solving
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
